title: Effects of Non-Glucose-Based Peritoneal Dialysis Solution "EXTRANEAL" on Changes in Leptin Levels and Sympathetic Activity Induced by Conventional Glucose-Based Dialysate "DIANEAL" in Patients on Peritoneal Dialysis

operands.value: Patients with end-stage renal disease(ESRD)/chronic kidney disease(CKD)stage 5
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Acute coronary syndrome in the past 6 months
Cardiac arrhythmias (2nd and 3rd degree heart block or premature ventricular complexes in Lown classes 4 or 5)
Symptoms suggestive of obstructive or central sleep apnea (with a score of > 10 on Epworth sleepiness scale)
Patients with leg injury involving nerve damage
Patients with significant bleeding disorder or liver disorder
Hemoglobin <1.05 g/dl at the time of initiation of therapy
patients with unilateral or bilateral nephrectomy
Planned kidney transplant in the next 4 months
Oliguria (urine output less than 400 ml per day)

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Adult (age 18 years and older)'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Patients with end-stage renal disease(ESRD)/chronic kidney disease(CKD)stage 5'), Not(Or(Symbol('Acute coronary syndrome in the past 6 months'), Symbol('Body mass index (BMI) > 34'), Symbol('Cardiac arrhythmias (2nd and 3rd degree heart block or premature ventricular complexes in Lown classes 4 or 5)'), Symbol('Diabetes Mellitus'), Symbol('Hemoglobin <1.05 g/dl at the time of initiation of therapy'), Symbol('Life expectancy under 6 months'), Symbol('Oliguria (urine output less than 400 ml per day)'), Symbol('Patients taking Clonidine'), Symbol('Patients taking anticoagulant medication'), Symbol('Patients unable to give consent'), Symbol('Patients with leg injury involving nerve damage'), Symbol('Patients with significant bleeding disorder or liver disorder'), Symbol('Planned kidney transplant in the next 4 months'), Symbol('Pregnant women'), Symbol('Symptoms suggestive of obstructive or central sleep apnea (with a score of > 10 on Epworth sleepiness scale)'), Symbol('patients with unilateral or bilateral nephrectomy'))))
